package.name: dynamixel_motors
package.description: This stack contains packages that are used to interface with Robotis Dynamixel line of servo motors. This stack was tested with and fully supports AX-12, AX-18, RX-24, RX-28, MX-28, RX-64, MX-64, EX-106 and MX-106 models.
package.author: Maintained by Antons Rebguns
contradict
